Text:
Let us pray.
Dwell with us in this place, Lord. Make this home a safe refuge from every snare and scheme of the enemy. [t] Fill this place with Your peace and love. Let the holy power of Your Kingdom protect us. [*] Place Your blessing upon and within us, now and forever, through Jesus Christ, our Lord.
Amen.

Extra.BreviaryInstructions: For the Easter Triduum, and Solemnities occurring during the week.

Changes: 2024-01-19 - Paul Prins: Reworked to be more stylistically in line with my writing.
2023-08-30 - Paul Prins: Retranslated this prayer to fit with other compline concluding prayers
2022-08-01 - Paul Prins: Change abbreviation and add instructions.
